name: Cursed Queen: Wicked Witch (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
name_original: Cursed Queen: Wicked Witch (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
Cursed Queen

After his girlfriend broke up with him, Denis go to the Melianie Forest at night. When he accidently free the Dark Fairies and theirs evil queen, Ixelda, he must stop them at all cost!

Wicked Witch

Manolita and Jesabel are good friends. When they summon a wicked witch, they got to stop her somehow…

---------------------------------------

Cursed Queen: Wicked Witch are two short stories written in Twine. Cursed Queen got multiple endings, while Wicked Witch is a linear tale (one end). They are also the remakes of Dark Fairies and Shirina.

---------------------------------------

  • You can toogle fullscreen with the ENTER key.
  • Choice of fonts, text size and background colors in the Settings menu! You can change the language there too.

---------------------------------------
